per_frame_1=warp = 0;
per_frame_2=//wave_mystery = sin(.5*time);
per_frame_3=
per_frame_4=delay = 0; //if(below(delay,0),3,delay-1);
per_frame_5=counter = if(equal(delay,0),counter+1,counter);
per_frame_6=counter = if(equal(counter,7),1,counter);
per_frame_7=
per_frame_8=wave_r = .5*below(counter,4)+.25*above(counter,5);
per_frame_9=wave_g = .5*above(counter,1)*below(counter,5)-.25*equal(counter,2);
per_frame_10=wave_b = .5*above(counter,4)-.25*equal(counter,7);
per_frame_11=
per_frame_12=wave_a = 1;
per_pixel_1=horbox = above(x,.4)*below(x,.6);
per_pixel_2=verbox = above(y,.25)*below(y,.75);
per_pixel_3=
per_pixel_4=sy = 2;
per_pixel_5=//sx = 1+horbox*(1-verbox);
